body_html:
@xav12358 need to initialize variables first before you execute anything within the graph (including saving variables), by using sess.run(tf.global_variables_intializer()) for example

EDIT: Sorry, I was only looking at glance, you can check the numpy file first whether the array for the mentioned variable exists or not, but seems it is better to ask the owner itself which you have already done
